amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the construction, expansion, renovation, or building of the Los Angeles Gay and Lesbian Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the construction, expansion, renovation, or building of the Los Angeles Gay and Lesbian Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
